description: OPINION & ORDER #100185 re: 78 MOTION to Dismiss The Amended Class Action Complaint filed by Goldman, Sachs & Co., Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, UBS Securities LLC, Utendahl Capital Group LLC, Citigroup Global Markets, Inc., Samuel A. Ramirez & Co. Inc., 75 MOTION to Dismiss Second Amended Complaint filed by Donald K. Truslow, Wachovia Capital Markets, LLC, Thomas J. Wurtz, Wachovia Corporation, G. Kennedy Thompson. For the reasons stated above, IT IS HEREBY ORDERED THAT: 1) The Wachovia Defendants' Motion to Dismiss the Equity Complaint is HEREBY GRANTED. 2) The Underwriter Defendants' Motion to Dismiss the Equity Complaint is HEREBY GRANTED; 3) The Wachovia Defendants' Motion to Dismiss the Stichting Complaint is HEREBY GRANTED; 4) The Wachovia Defendants' Motion to Dismiss the FC Holdings Complaint is HEREBY GRANTED; 5) The Wachovia Defendants' Motion to Dismiss the Bond/Notes Complaint is HEREBY GRANTED IN PART and DENIED IN PART; 6) The Underwriter Defendants' Motion to Dismiss the Bond/Notes Complaint is HEREBY GRANTED IN PART AND DENIED IN PART; and 7) Defendant KPMG's Motion to Dismiss the Bond/Notes Complaint is HEREBY DENIED. The Clerk of the Court is respectfully directed to terminate the following motions: 1) Doc. Nos. 75 and 78 in No. 08 Civ. 6171; 2) Doc No. 37 in 09 Civ. 4473; Doc. No 31 in 09 Civ. 5466; and Doc. Nos. 105, 108, and 111 in 09 Civ. 6351. The Clerk of the Court is also respectfully directed to close the following cases: 1) 08 Civ. 6171; 2) 09 Civ. 4473; 3) 09 Civ. 5466. The Bond/Notes parties shall (1) submit a joint proposed discovery schedule no later than 5/2/2011; and (2) appear for a status conference on Friday, 5/13/2011, at 3:30 p.m. (Signed by Judge Richard J. Sullivan on 3/31/2011) (tro) Modified on 4/1/2011 (tro). Modified on 4/4/2011 (tro). Modified on 4/6/2011 (ajc). (Entered: 04/01/2011)
